name: Chameleon Hide n' Eat(Weekly Game Jam #128)
name_original: Chameleon Hide n' Eat(Weekly Game Jam #128)
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam #128

Theme: Camouflage

Seek and be Sought in this arcade style game, using your camouflage abilities of a chameleon hide awaiting for your prey while also staying hidden from the Reapers that'll try to kill you.
